meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat usually in a roll or bun.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious hamburger for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a hamburger with cheese and pickles.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hamburger go to the gym? To get better buns!
meanings.sent4: The hamburger was a tower of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling smell of the hamburger made my mouth water.

meanings.sent1: The chef grilled the hamburger to perfection.
meanings.sent2: He formed the hamburger patty with care.
meanings.sent3: The hamburger patty was as round as a full moon.
meanings.sent4: The hamburger patty sizzled on the hot grill.
meanings.sent5: The juicy hamburger patty was the star of the barbecue.
